hangle: 거기에 있는거 다 알고 있다, 시그렌.
이럴 때만 보호자 노릇을 똑똑히 한다니까!
first_translate: this is why I hate being your guardian sometimes!
it’ll have to wait until next time.
let me try this thing called romance for once.
let me try this thing called romance for once.
is this really where his highness lives?
lord cain ereze, eldest son of house ereze.
you’ll soon recover from your injury and return here.
when you do, keep an eye on the second prince at all times.
but my lordship serves her majesty, the first imperial princess.
your post has been changed while you were away recovering.

hangle: 잘 감시해서, 이상한 건 바로 보고하거라.
first_translate: make sure to report anything unusual immediately.

hangle: 이건 가문을 위해 아주 중요한 일이다.
first_translate: doing this is very important for our family.
I don’t want to get involved in unnecessary things like these...

hangle: 이 지긋지긋한 정쟁은 아버지 대에서 끝내야 돼.
first_translate: but we must end this political struggle during my generation.
now look what I’ve gotten myself into...
so they weren’t lying about him returning today...
why are you guys acting like this?

hangle: 기사가 훈련이 힘들다고 하면 어떻게 해?
first_translate: if knights can’t handle training, how would you describe them?

hangle: 네가 아직 이곳을 못 겪어 봐서 그래!!
first_translate: of course not!! you haven’t experienced life here yet!!

hangle: 케인 에레즈, 시그렌 황자 전하를 처음으로 뵙습니다.
first_translate: I am cain ereze. it’s nice meeting you, your highness.

hangle: 오늘부터 황자 전하의 궁을 지키는 임무를 수행하게 됐습니다.
first_translate: starting today, I shall serve as one of your guards.
I may lack experience, but I promise to give it my best effort.
who does this guy think he is?

hangle: 진짜로 정식 예법대로 인사하는 놈은 처음 보네.
first_translate: I’ve never seen anyone greet someone according to proper etiquette before.
why isn’t he saying anything back?
everything had gone perfectly well in my life!
not only did I become the sole heir to the throne,

hangle: 내 심기를 거스르려는 사람은 하나도 없었단 말이다.
이 자리에서 시그렌을 정식 황자로 책봉하겠다!
first_translate: I hereby declare siegren as the official second prince!

hangle: 사생아 새끼가 그딴 식으로 등장하는 바람에!
first_translate: that illegitimate child appeared out of nowhere!

hangle: 최소한 쥐 죽은 듯 있었다면 참아줄 생각이었지만…
first_translate: I could tolerate him if he kept himself hidden somewhere,
but nope! instead, he attends social events without any shame,
and even dares grab me by the collar!

hangle: 고작 여자 한명에 대해 이야기 했다는 이유로!
first_translate: all because I talked about some woman!

hangle: 내가 황제가 되면 맨 먼저 그 자식을 단두대에 올릴 거다.
first_translate: the moment I take over the empire, I’m going to send him straight to the gallows.
until then, I need to find ways to torment him.

hangle: 그놈을 어떻게 괴롭게 할 방법이 없을까.
first_translate: until then, I need to find ways to torment him.

hangle: 그 자식이 유일하게 감정적인 동요를 나타낸 여자.
first_translate: the only person who ever made him lose control emotionally...

hangle: 보아하니 마음에 꽤 두고 있는 것 같은데.
first_translate: judging by their conversation earlier, he seems quite fond of her.
maybe I should mess with her a bit.

hangle: 헤일론 공작이 싸고도는 여자애를 대놓고 어떻게 하기는 힘들지만…
first_translate: but since duke halyeon keeps such close watch over her, it won’t be easy to approach her directly...
then again, if I can’t do it myself,
I just need to use others to do it for me!
